query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO DYNAMIC_EVENT (STUDY_GROUP_CLASS_ID, STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID, STUDY_ID, ORDINAL, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED, NAME, DESCRIPTION, IS_DEFAULT) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE DYNAMIC_EVENT SET STUDY_GROUP_CLASS_ID=?, STUDY_EVENT_DEFINITION_ID=?, STUDY_ID=?, ORDINAL=?, UPDATE_ID=?, DATE_UPDATED=sysdate, NAME=?, DESCRIPTION=?, IS_DEFAULT=? WHERE DYNAMIC_EVENT_ID=?
